values: Merry Christmas, happy holidays, and the rest of the greetings to you. Especially to my team, wherever you are and whatever you're doing. <strike>I miss you guys</strike>

It's been over a month since we left, huh...guess I should write about something.

...

...I hate these journal things. What's everybody been doing?

((OOC: Strikes deleted.)) Kaneda, I thought you should know Kaneda, I just wanted to say I'm sorry, I was an idiot and I know it and I wish there was something I could say to you that would make it all better. But I don't know what, and I don't know if it can happen if you're really scared of me. I don't want to force you to do anything you don't want to, ever, and I'm being pressured by people to make up with you but I don't want to if you really don't want to make up with me. If you're happy seperated, then good. I just Kaneda, I'm sorry I am the world's biggest idiot AAAAAAAAARGH.

Guess I'll be blunt, then. Kaneda and I broke up.

Guess I'll be staying home a little longer.

When I FIND the bastard who put those ideas in his head

It's not his fault as much as it is mine. I guess two people like us just aren't meant to be together.

I don't mean to be overprotective. I don't mean to have a temper. I want to be normal. I try really hard, but sometimes stuff just happens and I can't control it. 

It's better for him this way. If he really is...scared of me, then this is much better for him. I can't hurt him any more if we're not together, can I.

...except for this.

I hit a lot of stuff on the way home, so my hand's bleeding. Better stop before I mess up something else the keyboard anymore.


BAKAZAWA! YOU IDIOT!




So...I hate to ask this, but...where do I go from here...?

Yeah, it's true. I'm taking Dan home with me for a week or so. The kid needs some time away from all of you people harassing him and bothering him about stuff he shouldn't have to worry about, so I'm giving him a break as captain and senpai and friend. Those of you who have my cell number are welcome to call me if anything comes up.

<lj-cut text="Private to those of you who have my cell number">DON'T GIVE IT TO ANYBODY WHO'S NOT ON OUR TEAM. EVEN IF THEY PAY YOU.</lj-cut>

<lj-cut text="Private to Mizuki">I'm trusting you with the team for the next week. I expect to hear daily updates.</lj-cut>

<lj-cut text="Private to the team except for Dan">Be careful. Sengoku-san and Akutsu-san aren't happy with me right now, so there's a chance that they might take it out on you guys. Anything suspicious or crazy happens and I want you to call me, right away. No expections to time or place. I won't let anything happen to you guys, whether or not I'm there.</lj-cut>

<lj-cut text="Private to Kaneda">I love you. So, so much.</lj-cut>

Sengoku-san, can I talk to you when you have a minute?



Dan, you too. I want to talk to both of you at some point or other, so come find me.

Who keeps journals anyway? Tch.

Dan's joining our team. This is a message to all of you people who think you can mess with him. YOU CAN'T. He's part of our team as soon as the paperwork comes in, and as part of St. Rudolph he's a part of the St. Rudloph family and I won't tolerate any of you screwing that up.


Let me know if anybody tries anything.



Your tournament performance was abysmal. Practice, tomorrow. Outdoor courts. Be there. Dan, you can come too, if you want.



....and happy birthday to you birthday people.

I'm going to be frank. I don't like journals. So if you're expecting a novel in here, sorry, but that's not happening here.

Apparently Atobe's holding some sort of tennis tournament. I'm expecting all of you in St. Rudolph to enter and do us proud. In light of that, practice tomorrow, on the indoor courts. If you have a problem with that, bring it to me beforehand. Otherwise, no exceptions.

Also, Kaneda and I...um...nevermind. Let's just say I'm good at screwing things up.

Next time something like this comes up, does somebody want to try calling my HOUSE phone instead of my cell phone? Because if the damn thing's broken then it's not going to do any of us any good.

Just a note for the future. I'm here now, having fished the invitation out of the trash where my brother was "hiding" it. 

My friends list is also being stupid. I don't give a damn about it right now. I'll fix it later.

Oh, and team? Ten laps. All of you.
